overview: Young, beautiful, seductive, and absolutely deadly. Enter the world of high stakes contract killers with Club Jenna contract star Brea Bennett where the lines between nihilistic fantasies blur, Killer Desire heightens the thrill, and each passionate embrace could be your last! What price are you willing to pay for the ultimate sexual rush with one of the world's most beautiful women? Be careful what you wish for... you just might get it!
tagline: Brea Bennett. Contract Girl. Contract Killer.
title: Killer Desire
